    public class CustomerManagerService
extends Object
implements ICustomerManagerService
    The Class CustomerManagerService.

    Warning: DO NOT reference the core.service package classes directly as these are missing the required business functionalities. Use core.facade or ui.service classes instead.

    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomerManagerService()
      Default constructor for Customer Manager Service The constructor creates instance of the service and retrieves the single instance of the rest template from the RestTemplateContainer and assigns it to the restTemplate instance variable.
